derivation: third person singular present indicative active of a derivative of a compound of G3080 (λυσιτελεῖ) and G5056 (λυσιτελεῖ);
strongs_def: impersonally, it answers the purpose, i.e. is advantageous
outline:
1. to pay the taxes
  2. to return expenses
  3. to be useful, advantageous, it profits
